item.title: YouTube Video Editor with Motion Graphics Expertise - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a talented and experienced YouTube video editor with strong skills in motion graphics for our stock market/finance channel. The ideal candidate will be proficient in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects, with a keen eye for detail and creativity. You will be responsible for editing videos that are 4-5 minutes long initially, with plans to increase the length to 8-15 minutes for future projects.

Responsibilities:

Edit and produce high-quality YouTube videos in the stock market/finance niche.
Create engaging motion graphics to enhance the visual appeal of the content.
Source and integrate appropriate B-roll footage to support the video narrative.
Add suitable sound effects and background music to enhance the viewer's experience.
Ensure all content is edited to the highest standard and delivered on time.
Skills Required:

Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro and After Effects.
Strong ability to create motion graphics.
Experience in sourcing and incorporating relevant B-roll footage.
Excellent sound editing skills.
Attention to detail and creativity.
Ability to work to deadlines and manage time effectively.
References for Style and Quality:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZG33Ij8NWG4Video https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=e9SQIJdpip4
Additional Information:

We will provide the voice-over and script for each video.
If you are passionate about video editing and have a portfolio that demonstrates your skills in the areas mentioned above, we would love to hear from you. Please apply with your portfolio, and a brief description of your relevant experience.

About Us:

We are a growing YouTube channel focused on providing valuable insights and updates in the stock market and finance sector. Our goal is to create informative and visually engaging content that educates and entertains our audience.


We look forward to collaborating with a talented video editor who can help bring our vision to life.

Budget:

Please provide your rate for a 4-5 minute video and an 8-15 minute video.

Thank you!



Hourly Range: $6.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 22, 2024 09:42 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Skills: Video Editing, Motion Graphics, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects
Country: Germany
click to apply

item.title: Virtual Assistant | AI Image Generation + Youtube Content Creation - Upwork
item.description:
In search of a savvy and articulated Virtual Assistant to create long-form videos for a YouTube Channel about spirituality, philosophy and self-improvement.

Skill Requirements:
- Access to Capcut Pro and ChatGPT 4o, Midjourney or Leonardo.ai Premium
- Skilled with Capcut transitions, effects/ sound effects/ music etc
- You are committed to high quality without the need for lots of revisions
- You are organized, communicative and work efficiently in meeting deadlines
- A good command and understanding in AI generation prompts to create high quality images that are cohesive and consistent in style
- 2K HD output
- Experience with Canva (having Canva Pro is a bonus but not essential)

Job requirements:
- 20 mins per video
- 16-20 videos/ month
- Able to deliver quality work under tight deadlines
- You can deliver items via (Google Drive/ Trello)
- Potential long-term growth and opportunity
* Video Training Brief Provided

Video Sample:
https://youtu.be/bILneRll2no?si=aqKE-H_OjXjnzN91
https://youtu.be/q6vSi_FYmu8?si=Y1qF0Ql_v0DWMPx7

Priority given to the freelancer who best matches the Job Description. Budget is negotiable based on proven high-quality work and track record.

If this is you, please respond with RELEVANT WORK SAMPLES ONLY and your BID PER VIDEO for review.





Budget: $20
Posted On: June 22, 2024 09:41 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:CapCut, Midjourney AI, Midjourney Prompt, Canva
Skills: CapCut, Midjourney AI, Midjourney Prompt, Canva
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Social Media advertising for Health Care Company - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a skilled content writer, video creator, graphic designer to create and post multiple social media posts weekly for our health care company. The ideal candidate will be able to use initiative and creativity to develop engaging and informative content that aligns with our brand. This is a great opportunity for someone with experience in health care writing who wants to make a positive impact on our target audience. We run a private doctor service with multiple sites in UK.
Happy to pay $300-500 per month as the need grows
  Responsibilities:
  - Create and curate high-quality and relevant content for social media platforms
  - Develop a content calendar and schedule posts regularly
  - Monitor and engage with followers and respond to their queries and comments
  - Stay up-to-date with industry trends and incorporate them into the content strategy
  
  Requirements:
  - Proven experience in social media content creation for health care companies
  - Strong writing and editing skills with an ability to adapt and tailor content for different platforms
  - Knowledge of social media management tools and analytics
  - Familiarity with health care industry terminology and trends
  - Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
Ability to make engaging videos and search what kind are popular
  
  We are looking for a committed individual or company who can deliver consistent results. If you are passionate about health care and have a knack for creating compelling social media content, we would love to hear from you.

Budget: $300
Posted On: June 22, 2024 09:18 UTC
Category: Creative Writing
Skills:Content Writing, Blog Writing, Video Advertising, Advertising Automation, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Content Writing, Blog Writing, Video Advertising, Advertising Automation, Social Media Marketing
Country: United Kingdom
click to apply
